198
THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.
[OCTOBER 16, 1875.

Calista Hava @ Pensacola,—786 pcs. timber, 59 deals, Order. Sarah Andrews @ Pensacola,—2,643 spruce deals, 1,552 ends, 7,560 palings, 15,373 battens, A. Baltgae von Platen (s) @ Lulea,—19,828 deals and Wikstrom.
Hardwoods, &c.—16,000 treenails, G. Thompson, Leif @ Santa Anna,—361 logs, 37 ends, 14 crotches mahogany and cedar, Skelton & Co. Papenburg @ Minatitlan,—66 logs mahogany, Uhthoff & Co. Dolores @ Norterla @ Havana,—141 pcs. mahogany,—A. A. Morlet & Co. Valkyrien @ Trucill,—510 pcs. mahogany, 19 pcs. lignum vitæ, W. Guild & Co. Queen @ Tonala,—321 logs, 10 ends mahogany, Nottebohm & Co. Noa @ Tupilco,—504 logs mahogany, Gilmour & Co.
Staves.—Quebec,—8,140 pcs., Churchill & Sim; 14,400 pcs., Maris & Co.; 35,581 pcs., Order. Boston,—1,200 pcs., M'Lean, New York,—2,400 pcs., Moens & Co.; 7,800 pcs., J. Brand; 20,000 pcs., Order. Charleston,—2,500 pcs., H. & Co.; 25,000 pcs., Order. Riga,—6,830 pcs., Order. Pillau,—31,003 pcs., Order. Trieste,—2,060 pcs., Claudius & Co.; 66,100 pcs., Oppenheimer & Co.; 255,000 pcs., R. Fowler;—29,476 pcs., Allatina Bros. Danzig,—50,500 pcs.,—377,450 pcs., Order. Stettin,—59,082 pcs., Order. Fredrickshald,—11,33 1/2 m., Duus, Brown & Co.

LIVERPOOL.—From Sept. 29th to Oct. 12th.
Timber, Deals, &c.—San Jacinto @ Galveston,—6,835 pcs. pitch pine, Order. Ella M. Watts @ Bath,—2,240 deal ends, 11,699 deals, Order. Martha @ Quebec,—75,343 pcs. pine lumber, Order. Plutus @ Quebec,—54,468 boards, 16,222 palings, 2,665 planks, Order. S. B. Hale @ Portland, U.S.,—13,799 deals, 642 ends, 7,608 palings, Order. J. B. Newcomb @ Dorchester,—25,576 deals, &c., 1,290 ends, Order. Bonanza @ St. John, N.B.,—7,608 deals, 793 ends, 1,131 boards, 1,053 scantlings, 2,460 palings, Farnworth & Co. Sarimner @ Onega,—17,722 deals, &c., Order. Rex @ Pugwash,—1,648 ends, 12,471 deals, &c., Order. Jason @ Archangel,—20,790 boards, &c., Order. Zufriedenheit @ Danzig,—619 pcs. timber, 1,093 sleepers, Order. Chin Yang @ St. John, N.B.,—381 pcs. 7 c. timber, 11,139 deals, &c., 12,400 palings, Order. Eliza Morton @ Fernandina,—2,489 pcs. pitch pine, Cunningham, Shaw, & Co. J. S. Harris @ Pugwash, N.S.,—18,828 deals, &c., 4,712 ends, Order. L. J. Westa @ Richibucto,—10,252 deals, &c., 1,205 palings, Order. Quebec (s) @ Quebec,—14,459 pine deals, &c., Order. A. Sutherland @ St. John, N.B.,—28,702 deals, &c., 2,662 ends, Farnworth & Jardine. General Birch @ Quebec,—176 pcs. oak, 5 hickory, 4 ash, Harrison, Robinson, & Co.; 454 pcs. Nymphe @ Archangel,—10,544 deals, &c., Order. Clara @ Cocagne, N.B.,—10,358 deals, 1,000 palings, J. Malcolm. Abrasia @ Pugwash, N.S.,—6,821 deals, &c., 1,496 ends, Order. M. E. Downer @ Bangor, U.S.,—11,385 deals, 933 ends, 240 palings, 4,000 laths, Ross & Co. Dakota (s) @ N. York,—1,289 oars, Cunningham, Shaw, & Co. Nelson @ Quebec,—3,830 deals, 1,470 pcs. oak, 46 hickory, Order. Progress @ La Have River, N.S.,—8,518 deals, &c., 546 ends, Carvill & Son. A. S. Davis @ St. John, N.B.,—32,811 deals, &c., 2,224 scantlings, 7,478 palings, Farnworth & Co.—Birmingham @ Quebec,—1,212 pcs. timber, 2,947 deals, Bland & Co. Blomidon @ Three Sisters, N.S.,—13,611 deals, 680 scantlings, 597 ends, 21,075 bds. pickets, Order. Herbert Beech @ Quebec,—4,744 deals, 876 pcs. white pine, 59 ash, 6,719 deals, 58 hardwood, 4,371 palings, J. Malcolm. Flora @ Amherst, N.S.,—12,000 deals, &c., 18,000 palings, 60 t. timber, Vaughan & Co. C. W. White @ Pensacola,—2,435 pcs. pitch pine, Order. Wasama @ Miramichi,—20,600 deals, &c., 766 ends, 281 birch palings, Order. Strathearn @ N. York,—1,000 oars, Order. Palermo @ lathwood, 675 pcs. timber, Order. Empress @ Buctouche,—270 pcs. oak, Harrison, Robinson, & Co.; 815 pcs. white pine, 3,995 deals, 6,667 deals, &c., 339 scantlings, 1,961 ends, 121 pcs. birch, J. Malcolm. Lake Megantic (s) @ Quebec, N.S., 7,790 deals, 803 ends, 300 palings, Ross & Co. May M'Farland @ Halifax,—12,496 deals, &c., 33 pcs. birch, 2,240 palings, F. Carvell & Son. Romo @ Halifax,—12,936 deals, &c., 1,122 ends, 4,725 palings, 7,800 palings, Ross & Co. Bruno @ Bangor,—14,201 deals, 128 ends, 13,000 laths, 260 palings, 1,639 boards, 350 pcs. white pine, 2,524 palings, Guy & Co. Peerless @ St. John,—27,172 deals, 1,256 scantlings, J. Bland & Co.; 4,717 deals, Order. Polyma @ St. John, N.B.,—45,000 deals, 6,936 ends, 6,776 boards, Farnworth & Co. Oscar @ Three Rivers,—10,525 deals, 1,471 ends, 359 scantlings, Order. Johnson @ St. John, N.B.,—9,908 deals, 15,000 ends, 6,705 boards, 6,000 palings, Order. Earl of Elgin @ Quebec,—10,333 deals, &c., 3,067 scantlings, 8,008 palings, Farnworth & Co.; 23,468 treenails, Cunningham, M. A. Reade @ Fernandina,—2,174 pcs. pitch pine, 333 pcs. oak, 114 pcs. waney pine deals, Order. Kinburn @ St. John, N.B.,—9,908 deals, &c., 805 ends, 152 scantlings, Order. Polynesian (s) @ Quebec,—3,991 deals, J. Bland & Co. D. Cromwell @ St. John, N.B.,—10,525 deals, 1,471 ends, 359 scantlings, 7,000 palings, Order. Texas (s) @ Quebec,—3,310 deals, J. Bland & Co.; 5,808 deals, Order. Premier @ St. John, N.B.,—33,986 deals, 6,936 ends, 6,776 boards, 2,129 scantlings, 1,775 palings, Farnworth & Co.

—17,609 deals, 999 deal ends, Order. Aleppo @ Buctouche,—116 pcs. birch timber, 1,931 palings, J. Malcolm; 6,840 pcs. deals, &c., 916 ends, 164 scantlings, Farnworth & Jardine. Steinvora @ Quebec,—1,025 pcs. timber, 6,000 laths, Dobell & Co. John F. Kranz @ Bangor,—1,460 ends, 9,410 palings, Ross & Co. Henriette @ Portland,—18,618 deals, 700 ends, Order. Venus @ Quebec,—1,598 deals, 737 pcs. timber, Order. Victoria @ Gothenburg,—1,773 spars, Hall & Co. Sleipner (s) @ Gothenburg,—1,040 ends, 1,600 boards, P. Asbeck; 1,954 pcs. mining timber, 5,389 pit props, English and Swedish Timber Company. Live Oak @ Richibucto,—15,062 deals, 4,500 palings, Coltart & Co. Emma V. @ Cape Chatte,—1,138 deals, &c., 660 scantlings, 1,801 ends, 1,347 boards, Farnworth & Co. Chieftain @ Quebec,—1,000 deals, 765 pcs. timber, Order. John Geddie @ Pensacola,—999 pcs. timber, 945 deals, Order. W. G. Putnam @ Port Hood, C.B.,—1,913 pcs. timber, 845 deals, Order. Bel Stewart @ Bay de Verte,—3,312 deal ends, 848 pcs. Order. Northern Chief @ St. John, N.B.,—4,539 boards, 1,761 ends, 554 scantlings, 9,640 deals, D. Chapin @ Bangor,—12,471 deals, 2,659 ends, 966 pine boards, Bland & Co. The Charley @ Parsboro', N.S.,—6,750 deals, 1,160 ends, 5,375 pickets, 5 spars, Westfield @ St. John, N.B.,—27,124 deals, &c., 1,976 ends, 4,637 boards, Farnworth & Co. Louise @ Caraquet,—6,577 deals, 820 ends, Crow & Co. Maid of Orleans @ St. John, N.B.,—23,133 deals, 4,709 deal ends, 2,093 boards, Farnworth & Jardine. Evangeline @ Caraquet,—6,577 deals, 820 ends, Crow & Co. City of Berlin @ New York,—136 pcs. timber, P. Whiteside & Co. Franc Lamberth @ Calais,—782 deals, 13,510 deals, &c., 6,940 pickets, Bland & Co. Palestine (s) @ Quebec,—202 tamarac knees, T. W. Harley; 9,312 deals, J. Bland & Co.; 4,648 deals, Order. Algeria @ St. John, N.B.,—14,802 deals, &c., 1,089 scantlings, 1,688 boards, 1,238 deal ends, 7,000 palings, Carvill & Son. Clyde @ Quebec,—2,488 deals, 5,781 deals, 859 ends, 34 pcs. timber, J. Malcolm. Eliza @ Buctouche,—116 pcs. timber, 21,500 deals, Order. County of Picton @ Shinimicas,—907 deals, Order.
Mahogany, &c.—W. D. Seed @ Rangoon,—63 planks, Order. San Jacinto (s) @ Galveston,—2,000 treenails, Coltart & Co. Hamilton @ Demerara,—107 pcs. hardwood timber, G. Booker & Co.; 13 pcs. pine, H. Purse. Catharina @ St. Domingo,—136 lgs., 24 curls mahogany, 207 lgs., 490 pcs. lignum vitæ, 8 lgs. satinwood, Chaloner & Co.; 158 billets lignum vitæ, 13 crutches, 126 billets mahogany, Order. Roquelle (s) @ Old Calabar,—128 pcs. ebony, McCoskry & Green; 998 pcs., do. Stuart & Douglas; 566 do., Taylor, Laughland, & Co. Mexican @ Curaçoa,—18 crutches, 7 lgs. mahogany, Tomlinson, Hodgetts, & Co. 32 crutches do., M. Ventura. Willibald @ Boston,—347 sticks lignum vitæ, Rowe & Co. Nova Scotian (s) @ Baltimore,—7,502 treenails, Order. Pastora @ Cienfuegos,—87 pcs., 19 log ends mahogany, David. Son & Co. Saragossa @ Constantinople,—53 lgs. boxwood, Cavafy & Co.; 11,193 pcs. boxwood, Irvine & Sellars; 36 pcs. boxwood, Order. Olga @ Poti,—28,220 pcs. boxwood, 66 lgs. sawn do., 8 lgs. walnut, 446 oak staves, J. Gardner & Sons; 984 pcs. boxwood, Irvine & Sellars. Egyptian @ Constantinople,—195 tons boxwood, Irvine & Sellars. Wm. Fisher @ Demerara,—186 lgs., 7 pcs. hardwood, G. Brooker & Co. Ane @ Azua, W.I.,—417 pcs. mahogany, 1,857 pcs. lignum vitæ, E. Chaloner & Co. Africa (s) @ W.C. Africa,—120 sticks ebony, Nuttall & Co.; 1,699 billets ebony, B. & C. African Co. Titania @ Tonala,—234 lgs. mahogany, Nottebohm & Co. Sulitjelma @ Tabasco,—410 lgs., 31 pcs. mahogany, Graham & Co. Thela @ Tonala,—296 lgs. mahogany, 33 lg. ends, Skelton & Co. Syskonen @ Bassein,—69 wood ventilators, 228 boards, Order. Gracia @ Baltimore,—89 walnut lgs., Order. Blair Drummond @ Rangoon,—108 planks, Order. Lovisa @ Livingstone,—192 pcs. mahogany, 3 fantails mahogany, E. Chaloner & Co.;—
Staves.—Quebec,—84,313 pcs., Order; 15,800 pcs., Bland & Co. New York,—1,800 pcs., Chaloner & Co.; 8,600 pcs., Order. New Orleans,—2,400 pcs., Order. Baltimore,—4,800 pcs., Order. Trieste,—15,000 pcs., Order.

Aleppo @ Buctouche,—116 pcs. birch timber, 1,931 palings, J. Malcolm; 6,840 pcs. deals, &c., 916 ends, 164 scantlings, Farnworth & Jardine. Steinvora @ Quebec,—1,025 pcs. timber, 6,000 laths, Dobell & Co. John F. Kranz @ Bangor,—1,460 ends, 9,410 palings, Ross & Co. Henriette @ Portland,—18,618 deals, 700 ends, Order. Venus @ Quebec,—1,598 deals, 737 pcs. timber, Order. Victoria @ Gothenburg,—1,773 spars, Hall & Co. Sleipner (s) @ Gothenburg,—1,040 ends, 1,600 boards, P. Asbeck; 1,954 pcs. mining timber, 5,389 pit props, English and Swedish Timber Company. Live Oak @ Richibucto,—15,062 deals, 4,500 palings, Coltart & Co. Emma V. @ Cape Chatte,—1,138 deals, &c., 660 scantlings, 1,801 ends, 1,347 boards, Farnworth & Co. Chieftain @ Quebec,—1,000 deals, 765 pcs. timber, Order. John Geddie @ Pensacola,—999 pcs. timber, 945 deals, Order. W. G. Putnam @ Port Hood, C.B.,—1,913 pcs. timber, 845 deals, Order. Bel Stewart @ Bay de Verte,—3,312 deal ends, 848 pcs. Order. Northern Chief @ St. John, N.B.,—4,539 boards, 1,761 ends, 554 scantlings, 9,640 deals, D. Chapin @ Bangor,—12,471 deals, 2,659 ends, 966 pine boards, Bland & Co. The Charley @ Parsboro', N.S.,—6,750 deals, 1,160 ends, 5,375 pickets, 5 spars, Westfield @ St. John, N.B.,—27,124 deals, &c., 1,976 ends, 4,637 boards, Farnworth & Co. Louise @ Caraquet,—6,577 deals, 820 ends, Crow & Co. Maid of Orleans @ St. John, N.B.,—23,133 deals, 4,709 deal ends, 2,093 boards, Farnworth & Jardine. Evangeline @ Caraquet,—6,577 deals, 820 ends, Crow & Co. City of Berlin @ New York,—136 pcs. timber, P. Whiteside & Co. Franc Lamberth @ Calais,—782 deals, 13,510 deals, &c., 6,940 pickets, Bland & Co. Palestine (s) @ Quebec,—202 tamarac knees, T. W. Harley; 9,312 deals, J. Bland & Co.; 4,648 deals, Order. Algeria @ St. John, N.B.,—14,802 deals, &c., 1,089 scantlings, 1,688 boards, 1,238 deal ends, 7,000 palings, Carvill & Son. Clyde @ Quebec,—2,488 deals, 5,781 deals, 859 ends, 34 pcs. timber, J. Malcolm. Eliza @ Buctouche,—116 pcs. timber, 21,500 deals, Order. County of Picton @ Shinimicas,—907 deals, Order.
Mahogany, &c.—W. D. Seed @ Rangoon,—63 planks, Order. San Jacinto (s) @ Galveston,—2,000 treenails, Coltart & Co. Hamilton @ Demerara,—107 pcs. hardwood timber, G. Booker & Co.; 13 pcs. pine, H. Roquelle (s) @ Old Calabar,—128 pcs. ebony, McCoskry & Green; 998 pcs., do. Stuart & Douglas; 566 do., Taylor, Laughland, & Co. Mexican @ Curaçoa,—18 crutches, 7 lgs. mahogany, Tomlinson, Hodgetts, & Co. 32 crutches do., M. Ventura. Willibald @ Boston,—347 sticks lignum vitæ, Rowe & Co. Nova Scotian (s) @ Baltimore,—7,502 treenails, Order. Pastora @ Cienfuegos,—87 pcs., 19 log ends mahogany, David. Son & Co. Saragossa @ Constantinople,—53 lgs. boxwood, Cavafy & Co.; 11,193 pcs. boxwood, Irvine & Sellars; 36 pcs. boxwood, Order. Olga @ Poti,—28,220 pcs. boxwood, 66 lgs. sawn do., 8 lgs. walnut, 446 oak staves, J. Gardner & Sons; 984 pcs. boxwood, Irvine & Sellars. Chaloner & Co. Africa (s) @ W.C. Africa,—120 sticks ebony, Nuttall & Co.; 1,699 billets ebony, B. & C. African Co. Titania @ Tonala,—234 lgs. mahogany, Nottebohm & Co. Sulitjelma @ Tabasco,—410 lgs., 31 pcs. mahogany, Graham & Co. Thela @ Tonala,—296 lgs. mahogany, 33 lg. ends, Skelton & Co. Syskonen @ Bassein,—69 wood ventilators, 228 boards, Order. Gracia @ Baltimore,—89 walnut lgs., Order. Blair Drummond @ Rangoon,—108 planks, Order. Lovisa @ Livingstone,—192 pcs. mahogany, 3 fantails mahogany, E. Chaloner & Co.;—
Staves.—Quebec,—84,313 pcs., Order; 15,800 pcs., Bland & Co. New York,—1,800 pcs., Chaloner & Co.; 8,600 pcs., Order. New Orleans,—2,400 pcs., Order. Baltimore,—4,800 pcs., Order. Trieste,—15,000 pcs., Order.

HULL.
Sept. 29. Giro @ Wyburg,—98 c. deals, &c., Shields. Angelo (s) @ Christiania,—153 c. deals, Ronngren.
Oct. 1. Navarino (s) @ Fredrikshamn,—77 fms. firewood, Ronngren. Oceana @ Fredrikshamn,—67 c. deals, &c., Ronngren.
Oct. 4. Dania (s) @ Swartwick,—205 c. deals, &c., Brown. Oxford (s) @ Wyburg,—233 c. deals, &c., 3 c. deal ends, 3,432 pcs. lathwood, Bailey. St. Mattheus @ Archangel,—66 c. deal deals, Granberg. A. Nanninger @ Neder Kalix,—5 lds. firewood, 43 c. deals, &c., Voigt.
Oct. 5. Egden @ Arendal,—2,495 poles, 443 pcs. timber, Briggs. Hero @ Christiania,—127 c. deals, &c., 20 c. battens, Wilson. Pacific (s) @ Gothenburg,—17 c. battens, 945 bdls. laths, Wilson. Emily @ Fernandina,—10 c. deals, Johnson. Veritas @ Wyburg,—77 c. deals,
